channel.title: Everytime i set the rights my character resets
channel.description: Ok i really wanna know how to change the player rights without having my character reset. I'm using a 508 server how can i prevent my character from reseting

item.title: Everytime i set the rights my character resets
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Set the player’s rights in the login process, you’ll have to do it by name, though.

Example;

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(string)) { p.rights = 2; }

The code may be a bit different in the actual server, though.

Edit: Beat to it.

Read full topic
item.source: Everytime i set the rights my character resets

item.title: Everytime i set the rights my character resets

item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Do not use the notepad program, use wordpad or Microsoft Word if you have it
